#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	string s1, s2;
	vector<int> A( 26, 0 );
	int i, n1, n2;
	
	cin >> s1 >> s2;
	
	for( n1 = 0;s1[ n1 ] != '\0';n1++ );
	for( n2 = 0;s2[ n2 ] != '\0';n2++ );
	
	for( i = 0;i < n1;i++ )
		A[ s1[ i ] - 97 ]++;
	
	for( i = 0;i < n2;i++ )
		A[ s2[ i ] -97 ] = 0;
	
	for( i = 0;i < 26;i++ )
		if( A[ i ] > 0 )
			cout << (char)( 97 + i ) << A[ i ];
	
	cout << endl;
			
	return 0;
}
